Text: I've uploaded it, hang on for a few secs : )

Oh my goodness, what an ungrateful person rctroh is. 

Please don't think that we are all like this, we truly appreciate the time you all take in uploading this *for free* for us.
I don't rctroh was being ungrateful. He was just expressing his anxiousness. You can even see his playful emoticon at the end of his post. Sometimes, it's hard to read emotion across the internet.
